Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.blackjack

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Gui  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BetGui  
    BetGuiController
    BetGuiController.java The Controller class for the BetWindow.
    Blackjack
    Blackjack Class has the following: Deck, ArrayList (list for players), Player (dealer), and Card (next card to show).
    BlackjackGui
    BlackjackGui Class contains all widgets for Blackjack gam e interface.
    BlackjackGuiController
    BlackjackGuiController.java The Controller class for the Blackjack Table.
    BlackjackTest
    test class for Blackjack
    Card
    Card Class has the following variables: suit, value, name, isAce (check if Ace), and cardNumber (set to face if greater than 10)
    CardTest
    test class for Card
    Deck
    class Deck contains an ArrayList of Cards
    DeckTest
    test class for Deck
    GuiController
    GuiController.java The GuiController class for the Blackjack Game.
    GuiModel
    GuiModel.java The GuiModel class for the Blackjack Game.
    Hand
    Class Hand contains an ArrayList of Cards and an int representing the value of the hand
    HandTest
    test class for Hand
    Main
    Main.java The Main class for the Blackjack Game.
    MenuBar
    MenuBar.java The class for the menubar that is contained within the blackjack gui
    MenuBarController
    MenuBarController.java The Controller class for the menubar.
    NameGui
    NameGui.java The class for the NameGui.
    NameGuiController
    NameGuiController.java The Controller class for the NameGui.
    Player
    Player Class has the following: Hand, String name, and a boolean for busting.
    PlayerTest
    test class for Player
    RulesGui
    RulesGui.java The class for the RulesGui.
    RulesGuiController
    RulesGuiController.java The Controller class for the Rules screen.
    Sound
    sound class, plays background music from menu bar
    WelcomeGui
    WelcomeGui.java The class for the welcome gui.
    WelcomeGuiController
    WelcomeGuiController.java The Controller class for the Welcome screen.
